page.title: 05ABATTOIR
page.content: The abattoir was built in{1968}and at first was a family business.It was built for{slaughtering horses.}It has now been taken over by a larger firm in{Motherwell.}From employing 45 people it only employs 13. The animals,mostly accident cases, come from farms in{Perthshire, {Kinrosshire and Lothian.}The animals they deal with are all kinds of farm animals except horses.There are strict health and hygiene rules.Before the meat goes to butchers the meat inspector comes round and passes the meat for human consumption or for pet meat.The hides go to hide brokers. A special machine separates the liquids from the blood and the remaining solids are dried into high protein blood meal for cattle feeding.
